com.fortify.processrunner

Class AbstractProcessRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.processrunner.AbstractProcessRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICLIOptionDefinitionProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBugTrackerProcessRunner

    public abstract class AbstractProcessRunner
extends Object
implements ICLIOptionDefinitionProvider
    This class allows for running one or more independent IProcessor implementations as returned by the getProcessor(Context) method.
    Author:
    Ruud Senden

      protected abstract String getProcessingMessage(Context context)

      Get the IProcessor instance that will be run for this AbstractProcessRunner

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(Context context)
        Run the configured processor(s) using the configured context. Each configured processor is run with its own individual context.
